title: Squid Candy Challenge
description: Come and take part in the Squid-Candy-Challenge, a classic candy-cake-picking puzzle game for free. This is a wonderful online game for kids where you just have to cut the candy cake intact in a limited time, being careful not to break it, in order to succeed in the challenge. Can you complete the task?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Color Sort Puzzle
description: Spend your time wisely, relaxing and training your mind all at once! Put the water in the most strategic flask and enjoy when everything falls into place.
instructions: Click on the flasks to move the colored water on top from one to another. Make sure water of the same color is in one flask to pass the level. Use the power-ups in case you get stuck or don't know how to proceed.

title: Gun Clone
description: A free browser game Gun Clone in the arcade and runner genre about cloning guns. Upgrade your weapons, collect cards. The game for girls and boys. The game is endless and pay attention, the levels are simple, but there are also very difficult ones! Take weapons and destroy everything in your path! By collecting various bonuses, more and more destructive weapons appear in your hands.
instructions: Moving is done using your finger or mouse cursor. Shooting occurs automatically. Upgrading weapons occurs at the level or in the main menu.

title: Crafty Town Merge City
description: The latest strategy is here! If you want to build a town or rule your own kingdom, do it now! Here, you can build a house and turn it into the biggest castle in your kingdom. If you like architecture or strategy games, I guess you do, you will have a good time! Playing the new kingdom builder is absolutely free! Make your empire great!
instructions: Slide on the screen to merge the same buildings and get a higher-level building.

title: Monster Girls Back to School
description: Welcome to Monster Girls Back To School. Join the Monster Girls as they prep for school! Assist them in selecting the ideal outfits for a stylish return. Dive into their supernatural world, full of fashion choices and exciting back-to-school adventures. Get ready to be their fashion guide and have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click or Tap to play

title: Coloring by Numbers. Pixel Rooms
description: Immerse yourself in a game where the process of coloring becomes truly meditative. Create and decorate houses as a designer. Just touch the screen and the colors will match the numbers in the image. Forget about boring routine - now you are thinking about color combinations. For even more relaxation, a music player has been added.
instructions: Control - touch / left mouse button

title: My Fire Station World
description: Have you ever wondered how the firefighter rescues and helps others in emergencies? How do they deal with dangerous fires? This role-play takes you to explore the world of firefighters and learn about their daily work. Our game has 6 scenarios about the life and work of firefighters for you to choose from. You can drag and drop to place the characters as you like, place props, and change the firefighting costumes.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Bolts and nuts
description: The game Bolts and Nuts is a logic puzzle? in which you have to unscrew bolts from planks?! Your task is to choose the right bolt to unscrew? so that you can unscrew all the planks ✌! Compete with friends and colleagues ?!
instructions: How to play: PC Unscrew a bolt - Select the bolt you want to unscrew and click on it with the left mouse button. Screw a bolt - Click on the hole with the left mouse button into which you want to screw a bolt. How to play: Smartphone Unscrew the bolt - Select the bolt you want to unscrew by pressing on it with your finger. Screw the bolt - Click on the hole you want to screw the bolt into.

title: Paint race
description: Run around the circle and jump over dark obstacles. Paint the circle to pass levels. Collect the stars. Enjoy and get fun.
instructions: Click, tap, space or W to jump

title: Chibi Doll - Avatar Creator
description: Street - it's no matter build your modern city life or just stick with village-like town world you always be enjoy with it! Room - decorate and design home girly world. Gacha - unlock countless gachapon surprises your lovely avatar, bring gacha to your fantasy life! Dress Up Games - match and mix more than 5000+ girly items for dressing up princess: hairstyle, clothes, hats, accessories, freckles, moles, blush, wings, tails.
instructions: Use left mouse click to change outfit.

title: Stickman: Dinosaur arena
description: Take command of a squad of dinosaurs and go into battle with them! Reinforce your squad, unlock new dinosaurs and upgrade existing ones. Go as far as possible and become a great Dino Commander!
instructions: Unlock new dinosaurs and strengthen your squad. Kill all the enemies in the level to move on to the next one. Control your character with WASD on PC and with the joystick on your phone.

title: Pumpkin Catcher
description: Fly on a jetpack between walls and avoid rotating traps. Catch pumpkins using your favorite monster: zombie, vampire, devil or even a cat! Try this challenging Halloween game and set a new world record in catching pumpkins. Compete with your friends on the online leaderboard! Collect them all!
instructions: Tap for a short fly. Tap and Hold for a long fly.

title: Idle Dice 3D: Incremental Game
description: In this game, you roll dice and accumulate coins. Upgrade dice to generate more coins, even when you are not actively playing (Offline earnings). Idle Dice 3D stands out with its variety of dice: from classic six-sided to dice with 2, 4, 8, 10, 12, and 20 sides. Aim for combinations like pairs, triples, straights, and more to increase profit. The Prestige system allows you to reset your progress to boost future earnings, adding a strategic element to the game. The game also has achievements.
instructions: Press left mouse button or touch the screen to roll dices.

title: Exit - Puzzle
description: Embark on an exciting journey in Exit - Puzzle, a captivating game where your mission is to rotate the puzzle and guide the ball to the exit! Each level presents new challenges, requiring you to think creatively and find the best route. Twist and turn the puzzle to navigate through obstacles and unlock the path forward. With a variety of levels and progressively harder puzzles, this game will keep you entertained and engaged.
instructions: Mobile: touch on the left or right side screen to rotare level Desktop: use left or right keys to rotare level

title: Color Rings Block Puzzle
description: Color Rings Block Puzzle is a fun and addictive mobile game that challenges your problem-solving skills and reflexes. The game is simple to play but difficult to master, making it perfect for both casual and hardcore gamers.
instructions: Left mouse button

title: Planet Merge
description: Embark on an interstellar journey in the most thrilling puzzle game of 2025! Merge planets in a cosmic challenge and create a universe of fun. imple Yet Addictive Gameplay: Just drag and release to align the planets. Watch as they combine into spectacular new celestial bodies.
instructions: Just use you mouse to move and left-click to drop!

title: Domino Smash 3D
description: Domino Smash 3D is a free online puzzle game for boys played on a puzzle game. You will control a ball to rush to dominoes, knocking all domino cards down. The game uses unique physics to operate, just pay attention to avoid obstacles, and unlock brand-new Domino on different levels. Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop are playable. Are you ready for the challenge?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Little Commander. Red vs Blue
description: Build and develop your camp! Upgrade your army. Reds versus Blues! Command squads, build tanks and vehicles! Lead a crowd of soldiers! Lead them into battle! Attack and defend! You are the leader, the little commander! Get on the tank and into the battle
instructions: Control: For PC. Character control - "WASD", "arrows" or hold the left mouse button and drag the mouse in the desired direction. Shooting - the hero shoots automatically. For Mobile devices. Character control - press your finger on the screen and drag your finger in the desired direction. Shooting - the hero shoots automatically.

title: The Basement isn't THAT haunted
description: A puzzle game about finding things in a messy basement and avoiding paranormal danger. As a cute little bunny you look through the boxes stored in the basement and try not to open the ones with ghosts inside.
instructions: Move around and open boxes with the arrow keys. Hold space to fast forward.

title: Police Station
description: As the head of multiple police precincts, your mission is to boost the security rating in the district under your watchful eye. Begin your adventure by managing a modest police department, strategically hiring officers, and putting in the effort to cultivate a safer community
instructions: Swerve to move or use WASD and arrow keys

title: CRAZY VAN
description: Operate your car to defeat zombies! Defeating zombies will earn you coins, which you can use to strengthen your car. If you kill a lot of zombies, the time limit will be added, allowing you to defeat more zombies.
instructions: Drag to control the direction of the car.

title: IDLE Pet
description: Anatomical clicker. Start with one cell and create a whole animal! You will see what the body is made of from the inside, gradually growing bones, organs, skin and wool!
instructions: The main goal of the game is to create an animal step by step, collecting billions of cells. The game begins with the creation of the first animal out of 8 - a dog. As some part of the body grows, others will open. Cells are accumulating in a certain amount per second, depending on the lvl of improvements, for each click on the "cell" button, or you can buy them for virtual currency.

title: Geometry Rush 4D
description: Geometry Rush 4D is an exhilarating 4D platformer that takes speed, precision, and reflexes to the next level. In this fast-paced, action-packed game, you guide a customizable character through vibrant, geometric worlds filled with intricate obstacles and dynamic traps. The game's signature dash mechanic allows players to perform rapid movements, weaving through ever-changing environments with seamless control.
instructions: Space/Up Arrow/Left Click - JUMP

title: Dream Restaurant 3D
description: Ready for the ultimate restaurant challenge in Dream Restaurant 3D? Embark on a journey to establish your very own restaurant empire. The mission is straightforward: swiftly attend to customers, prepare delectable hamburgers, stack them up, and gracefully serve them around the tables. Expand your team by hiring proficient waiters, accumulate profits, and gradually construct an unparalleled restaurant empire!
instructions: Slide to play the Dream Restaurant 3D, unlock new areas, collect cash, and make foods for customers!

title: My City Hospital
description: My City Hospital is a sophisticated digital doll placement game. Have you ever thought about being a doctor or running a hospital to help others? you can realize your dream without leaving home. In this game, you run a large hospital with 7 management areas. In this hospital, you can help others deliver babies and take care of babies, examine patients, and help patients with surgery.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Deep Fishing
description: Dive into the fun with Deep Fishing! Explore the deep blue, cast your line, and reel in a variety of exciting fish species. Upgrade your gear, unlock rare catches, and become the ultimate fishing legend! Easy to pick up, but hard to put down – can you score the rarest fish and show off your skills?
instructions: Tap/Click and hold and move to move the bait underwater

title: School Teacher Simulator
description: Evaluate the students' answers in the Teacher Simulator game! Give grades to students, check your homework and test your school knowledge! This is a cool game for teachers, as well as for students who want to try themselves as a teacher! In the Teacher Simulator game, you will have to evaluate students' answers, check their homework, conduct tests for two-year students and check your school knowledge. Become the best teacher and cope with any challenges that your students throw at you!
instructions: Use a mouse to play with a PC, and touch input to play with a phone. Choose who will answer from the students by clicking on the student. Put a two or a five by clicking on the appropriate buttons

title: Gun Builder
description: Defeat all incoming enemies, and protect yourself from attacks! Pick up props to strengthen your attacks, but be careful—once your health reaches zero, the mission is over. Ready to experience the action? Play now!
instructions: + Defeat all enemies rushing towards you by attacking them. + Keep an eye on your health bar—each enemy hit reduces your health. + If your health drops to zero, the mission fails. + Your goal is to survive by defeating all enemies and preventing them from getting too close. Controls: Mobile: Slide your finger across the screen to control your character's movement left and right. PC: Use WASD to control your character's movement left and right.

title: Hexa Tile Trio
description: Welcome to Hexa Tile Trio! Your goal is to clear the board by sorting hex tiles into groups of three. Tap a tile to move it to an empty or matching spot below. If no tiles fit, or you run out of space, the level fails. With a ticking clock and unique puzzles, can you master the hex tiles before time runs out?
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to move a hexa tile from stacks to an empty spot below.

title: Count and Bounce
description: Count And Bounce is a ball puzzle game. It guides the ball forward. Release your hand and the ball will keep moving forward. You need to turn the tiles to prevent the ball from falling. There will be calculation questions on some tiles and you need to choose the best tile to bounce based on the number of balls you have. Have fun!
instructions: On pc Slide to rotate and guide left or right. On mobile & tablet Touch the screen and drag left or right.

title: My Dinosaur Land
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of "My Dinosaur Land"! This is an exciting game where you will become the owner of a unique farm filled with dinosaurs! Your task is to transform an ordinary farm into a real dinosaur paradise, taking care of funny and exciting creatures of prehistoric times.
instructions: Objective of the game: Collect dinosaurs, place them in enclosures, sell them at the checkout and improve your farm Controls on desktop: LMB to move the character. Control on mobile device: Joystick to move the character.

title: Hamster Combo IDLE
description: Upgrade your stock market hamster! A new Idle clicker, thanks to which you will learn a lot about cryptocurrency exchanges. Dig up the crypt and upgrade your hamster.
instructions: The goal of the game is to create an animal, cell by cell. In the center of the screen is a model of your creation. Cells accumulate in a certain amount per second, depending on the pumping of improvements, for each click on the "cell" button, or are bought for virtual currency, and they can also be extracted by clicking on the cell. Don't forget to upgrade the features in the game!

title: Wood & Screw Puzzle
description: Welcome to the Wood & Screw Puzzle, where the world of puzzles meets the thrill of fasteners! Embark on a thrilling adventure where bolts, nuts, and wooden puzzles collide in a mind-bending challenge. Dive into a world filled with conundrums, where every turn reveals a new twist in the game.
instructions: Solve the Wooden Puzzle: Conquer the challenge of the wooden stack, untangle bolts and nuts, and unlock the secrets hidden dee...

title: Conduct This
description: Conduct This is a cartoon-style free puzzle online game played on PuzzleGame for boys. You need to move the obstacles on the track so that the train can pass successfully. Get coins for passing levels and unlock the beautiful skins of the train. Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop are playable. I guess it's easy for you. Are you ready to try it now?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Car Service Tycoon
description: Car Service Tycoon is a fun game designed for car enthusiasts. Open your own garage and start with a large collection of vehicles. In the game, you can fix the engines, repair brake systems, and fix electrical problems to get the vehicles ready for the road again. There's also the option to customize the exterior of the vehicles; you can change the paintwork, modify the rims and upgrade the exhaust systems.
instructions: You can control the character by touching or using "MOUSE" or "W,A,S,D".

title: Mega Prize Scratch
description: Embark on a fun journey and try your luck with scratch cards. The appearance and value of houses, cars, or animals are in your hands. Win big with the scratchers, complete all the missions, and ensure every story has a happy ending.
instructions: This casual game consists of earning coins from scratchers and upgrading bad-looking objects, such as houses or cars, in each world you visit. Your mission ends when the items are fully upgraded. Then you will travel to another world where another mission and more scratch cards await you.

title: Beat Blader 3D
description: Immerse yourself in the ultimate rhythm experience with Beat Blader 3D, where music meets action! Slash your way through vibrant, futuristic landscapes in sync with the beat of your favorite songs. Armed with dual energy blades, you’ll slice through incoming obstacles, hitting targets in perfect harmony with the rhythm, all while dodging challenges that appear in time with the music.
instructions: Use mouse or finger to move

title: Cuddle Monster Fusion
description: Engage, Merge, and Challenge! Dive into a world of cuddly creatures where you combine identical monsters to evolve them and keep them from overflowing. But here’s the twist: when the same monsters collide, they transform into an entirely new, adorable creature. Can you merge your way to the ultimate fluffy beast?
instructions: -Tap and drag to move monsters-Release to drop monsters-Merge same monsters to evolve!

title: Domino Solitaire
description: Experience the classic game of dominoes in a whole new way! Match and connect domino tiles progress in an endless solitaire experience. With intuitive gameplay, Domino Solitaire offers lots of brain-teasing fun. Can you strategically plan your moves to become the ultimate Domino Solitaire master? Play now and find out!
instructions: Connect the domino pieces on the bottom of the screen with the ones on top by dragging the pieces up.

title: Mega Fall Ragdoll Simulator
description: Mega Fall Ragdoll Simulator is a casual game where you unleash chaos by dropping a ragdoll from towering structures to maximize bone-crunching impact. Experience realistic physics as you strategize your way through intricate levels, earning coins to unlock skins and enhance your ragdoll's appearance. Brace yourself for an ultimate destruction experience like no other!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

title: Nesting Dolls
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with an addictive puzzle game that will challenge your mind and soothe your soul. Immerse yourself in a world of bright colours and intricate Russian matryoshka dolls as you complete tasks to clear the field and become a true matryoshka doll master.
instructions: The aim of the game is to clear the whole field. You have to drag the nesting dolls to the bottom tier. Three nesting dolls of the same colour disappear and make room. Be careful, if the bottom tier fills up, you lose.

title: Pull The Thread - Puzzle
description: Unwind your mind with Pull The Thread - Puzzle, a captivating HTML5 game that challenges your logic and creativity! In this fun puzzle game, your task is to stretch a thread between all the screws on the screen, creating intricate patterns while solving each level. As the puzzles grow more complex, your problem-solving skills will be put to the test. With simple controls, engaging gameplay, and a satisfying sense of accomplishment.
instructions: Use the mouse or touchscreen to pull the end of the thread.

title: Fill Glass
description: Fill Glass is a simple yet addictive game. Fill the glass to the perfect level without letting it overflow or fall short of the target. Precision is key as you pour, aiming for the highest highscore! As you progress, upgrade your pouring machine to enhance your accuracy!
instructions: Mobile: tap to where you want the liquid to pour to move the dispenser PC: Move the dispenser with mouse and click to pour the liquid

title: Paint Master
description: Paint Master is a fun casual puzzle game. The homeowner has arranged a strict painting plan for you, you need to arrange the painters to paint in a certain order. Match your paint color with the owner's arrangement and you will be the winner. If there is a difference, the owner will return you to work.
instructions: How to play: 1. Observe the schematic diagram given at the top; 2. Determine the order of painting based on the available patterns; 3. Click on the painter to work;

title: Cat Cut
description: A fun game about a hungry cat, get him a fish, cut the rope so that it falls directly to the cat. All objects move according to physics, do not miss the fish, do not upset the cat!
instructions: To complete the level, determine the route of movement of the fish, cut the rope or, conversely, rock or push and so on, depending on the level, so that the fish gets into the cat. Each object works in its own way, something flies, something falls, something cuts. Solve the riddle and feed the cat. To get points, collect coins with a fish, for which you can unlock new characters!

title: Rooftop Challenge
description: Rooftop Challenge is an exhilarating parkour adventure where players must leap, climb, and strategize their way through a sprawling urban landscape. Starting from ground level, the goal is to find the elusive "house" that serves as the gateway to even greater heights. Once found, the journey continues as players ascend rooftop after rooftop, navigating complex jumps, narrow ledges, and towering structures.
instructions: - Arrow to Move - Space to Jump

title: Math Quest
description: "Math Quest" - an exciting game for the whole family that develops mathematical skills, logic, and reaction speed. Overcome challenges, calculate correct answers, and reach new levels!
instructions: Solve all the math problems and answer the questions in the given time.

title: Animal Transform Race
description: Animal Transform Race is a fun game based on reaction where different types of animals compete. Each animal is fast in some areas and very slow in some tracks according to their abilities. Try to lead the race by making the right choices. The faster you make animal choices, the more advantages you gain. You can unlock new animals from the market section with the coins you earn from the races.
instructions: You can use "MOUSE" or touch controls to change animals. For 2 player mode, you can use "A,S,D" and "J,K,L" keys for shortcuts to change animals.

title: Antistress Relaxation Box
description: Antistress - Relaxation Box is a fun casual game. Have you long been upset with some people in your life? He may be your date or a relative, and this game will vent your dissatisfaction! Choose a character and a tool for hitting, and your task is to beat the blood bar to 0 in a limited time. Easy to pick up, but informative and will give you hours of entertainment. Relax yourself and have fun!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Crazy Motorcycle
description: Drive Nubik along exciting tracks. Jump over gaps, go around obstacles and reach the finish line! Lots of different levels, drive a motorcycle, get there without destruction. You have to drive a motorcycle with a noob and get to the finish line. Jump over gaps and go around obstacles at high speed. Exciting levels are waiting for you!
instructions: On PC: WASD or arrow controls Jump - Space On the phone: Control via buttons and joystick on the screen
